articles.description: “Athletics has lost one of its brightest young stars in the most tragic circumstances,” World Athletics President Sebastian Coe said of Agnes Tirop.
articles.content:
According to Reuters, Makori added that it appeared to police officers who arrived at the scene after Tirops father had reported her missing that Tirop had been stabbed in the neck with a knife.
Sto… [+1984 chars]
